title: Our Story
description: Pretty Homes is a Sydney-based custom builder whose foundation is laid by a bunch of professionals in the residential and commercial building industry. At Pretty Homes, we value honesty, integrity, and continuous improvement. Pretty Homes offers an extensive range of luxury, modern single-story and double-story homes. The team at Pretty Homes continually strives for excellence with every project and is dedicated to maintaining a reputation as a quality custom home builder.

title: Our Philosophy
description: We believe that a building becomes a home when it tells the story of its occupants. We commit to understand your requirements and be open to all suggestions and feedback from you. We will make sure that the design and building process will be an enjoyable journey. Together we can build a beautiful piece of architecture.

title: Custom Home Designs
description: At Pretty Homes, we listen to you. Building a home is a creative journey and we would like to help you achieve your dream home. We have a professional team to assist you in creating your custom home that suits your budget and style. Our ideas are always functional and cost-effective and above all, we strive to create your lifestyle. You may have a difficult site to build on, you may like to rebuild your home or you may just want to explore the possibility of building a home, we would love to hear from and create something special togetherâ€¦
